name: Merry Lumpmas 2017
description:
Merry Lumpmas 2017!

The December collaboration of the 'Lumpy' community. Participants created their own trees with descriptions! Browse the tree lot and have a look. Which is your favorite?

Merry Christmas from all of us!

Music: Wham! - Last Christmas (Sega Genesis Remix) by Yuzoboy

Game assembled by SalamiChild Follow him on twitter!

We do fun collaborations every month! Come check out the Lumpy Pixel Art stream!

Be sure to check out Lumpy's twitter as well!
